_.name: Omikron_Exportextension
_.summary: This module extends the dataflow module, so categories, child/parent SKUs and gallery image URLs can be added to the product export.
_.description:
This module extends the dataflow module. It contains a parser, which can be used by an advanced profile. This &quot;parser&quot; has this features: - adding category names to the product export - removing html tags - removing linebreaks from the content - adding absolute image and product links - adding parent SKUs for simple products that are part of a configurable product - adding child SKUs for configurable products - adding gallery image URLs associated with a product This module only can be used to export product data. See the Documentation for more details.
You find a full documentation here: http://www.magentocommerce.com/boards/viewthread/60113/ (English Version)
http://www.magentocommerce.com/boards/viewthread/60111/ (German Version)
Ability to add parent/child SKUs and gallery images added by Richard Aspden, http://www.insanityinside.net/
_.notes: Added ability to export gallery image URLs, fixed bugs with column display, bumped to 1.3.1
